components.description: The fingers of a hand sticking up in the air.
Imagine a blanket draped over something and the edges hanging down.
Can mean each / every (and serves as the phonetic component)
A cloud (originally also “say” or “speech” in ancient scripts).

interpretation:
Although it might feel intuitive to interpret 云 as being “above” the person (since clouds are above people), **the actual character has 人 on top** and 云 underneath.

What might this symbolize?
• A {人:person} standing over or leading a **group / thought / idea** (云).
• Or a **person coming together over shared speech** (云) — pointing to meanings like:
	• to meet
	• to understand
	• to be able to do something (as in potential)
• a meeting or event
